div.name: R0RTY3JpcHQ=
div.literal_block:
const MAX_15B = 1 << 15 const MAX_16B = 1 << 16
func unsigned16_to_signed(unsigned): return (unsigned + MAX_15B) % MAX_16B - MAX_15B
func _ready(): var f = FileAccess.open("user://file.dat", FileAccess.WRITE_READ) f.store_16(-42) # å‘ç”Ÿç¯ç»•ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ 65494 (2^16 - 42)ã€‚ f.store_16(121) # åœ¨èŒƒå›´å†…ï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ 121ã€‚ f.seek(0) # å›åˆ°å¼€å¤´ï¼Œè¯»å–å­˜å‚¨çš„å€¼ã€‚ var read1 = f.get_16() # 65494 var read2 = f.get_16() # 121 var converted1 = unsigned16_to_signed(read1) # -42 var converted2 = unsigned16_to_signed(read2) # 121
